name: BeautifulAzan
0:
”Alexa, open Beautiful Adhan.”
”Alexa, ask Beautiful adhan to play an amazing Adhan.”
”Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play a new Azan.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beautiful adhan
des:
This "Beautiful Azan" app lets you play formal Muslim call to Prayer (Adhan, Azan, Athan) with the best sound quality and heart touching 5 different reciter beautiful voices to choose from. The app will choose a random Adhan (Azan, Athan) as soon as you launch the app and say different keyphrases (intents). If you have lived somewhere where there is no Masjid (Mosque) nearby, this would be a great app to listen to Azan on Salah(Namaz) times. There is a live Azan recording and you may hear some noises in the background but I found the voice beautiful so I added it too.
If you'd like to listen to the Fajar Adhan please ask Alexa to play Fajar Adhan as Fajar Azan is different to other normal Azan, Adhan. 
Example phrases you can say to Alexa:
Alexa, open Beautiful Adhan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play Fajar Adhan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play Fajar Azan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play Fajar Athan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play Adhan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play a different Azan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play different Adhan
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play an amazing Adhan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play Beautiful Azan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to play the new Azan.
Alexa, ask Beautiful Adhan to Play Azan.
Or just say "Azan" or "play Azan" after you've launched the skill.

Feedback / Getting in touch with us:
This is the first ever app I have created and never made anything similar to this before. I am not a professional developer but a lifelong learner. It was just an idea and a hobby in my spare time as I love to learn to code. I worked hard and spent a lot of time making this app available to you. I broke it many times and fixed it again and again. I am sure I will still have mistakes in it or some recommendations from you to improve the skill. I would love to hear any feedback or suggestions you may have to improve the skill. Feel free to reach out with any feedback or suggestions at "funtasticworld2020@gmail.com" or write a review and I will try my best to resolve any issue.
This skill will work by default on all Amazon Alexa Devices including devices with displays and no additional hardware is required.

Credit:
A special thanks go to online tutorials, Treehouse (the online course where I started my first coding lesson), Free online courses, some coding books, Steve from Dabble Lab (youtube), Andrea Muttoni (Technical Evangelist at Amazon Alexa), Muhammad Salman who provided all the MP3s and Alexa voice replaced with Amberina Bradford UK.
All the rewards of this skill go to my late father, May Allah be pleased with him.

Disclaimer:
The language used for this skill as part of delivering prayers and the skill content is Arabic.

Launched June - 2019.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
